mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.remark, s.visit_level, s.create_by, s.create_time, s.update_by, s.update_time, s.space_id, s.img, cu.name as 'createName', uu.name as 'updateName', ud.privilege FROM hw_doc s left join hw_user cu on cu.id = s.create_by left join hw_user uu on uu.id = s.update_by left join hw_user_doc ud on ud.doc_Id = s.id where s.id = #{id} and ud.user_id = #{createBy}

SELECT s.id, s.name, s.remark, s.visit_level, s.create_by, s.create_time, s.update_by, s.update_time, s.space_id, s.img, cu.name as 'createName', uu.name as 'updateName' FROM hw_doc s left join hw_user cu on cu.id = s.create_by left join hw_user uu on uu.id = s.update_by where s.id = #{id}

select s.id, s.name, s.space_id, s.remark, s.img, s.visit_level, s.create_by, s.create_time, s.update_by, s.update_time, hu.name as 'createName', (select privilege from hw_user_doc where user_id = #{createBy} and doc_id = s.id) as privilege from hw_doc s LEFT JOIN hw_user hu on s.create_by = hu.id where find_in_set(s.id, (select group_concat(doc_id) from hw_user_doc where user_id = #{createBy})) or s.visit_level = #{visitLevel}

select s.id, s.name, s.space_id, s.remark, s.visit_level, s.create_by, s.create_time, s.update_by, s.update_time, u.privilege from hw_doc s LEFT JOIN hw_user_doc u ON u.doc_id = s.id where u.user_id = #{createBy} and find_in_set(s.id, (select group_concat(doc_id) from hw_user_doc where user_id = #{createBy}))
and s.space_id = #{spaceId}

select id, name, space_id, remark, visit_level, img, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from hw_doc
visit_level = #{visitLevel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hw_doc ( name, space_id, remark, visit_level, img, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time ) VALUE ( #{name}, #{spaceId}, #{remark}, #{visitLevel}, #{img}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE hw_doc
name = #{name},
space_id = #{spaceId},
remark = #{remark},
visit_level = #{visitLevel},
img = #{img},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT privilege FROM hw_user_doc WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND doc_Id = #{docId} UNION SELECT privilege FROM hw_user_space WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND space_id = #{spaceId}
